cant recommend these games enough  ive been playing point and click adventure games since the 80s and daedelic is one of the most underappreciated developers in the genre  ive played the harry edna series whispered world and a few others  a new beginning was a bit preachy but they were all solid games  if youre into the genere like i am these are a no brainer  and they are often on sale

a fun german point and click well made and humorous especially in the german synchronization yet suffers from the same problems of others in the genre that some solutions to puzzles can be a bit abstract or relying on you to notice a small smudgecrack on a glass in one of the many areas however thankfully this is not the problem for a majority of the puzzles

the game is very nicely presented   graphics are nice with crisp characters and backdrops music and voice acting is great  the game has a nice story with interesting and fun characters with clear signposting to show what goals the player needs to achieve   some of the solutions were a little obtuse though with this game less than the previous and following games  i felt like goal the female lead i guess lacks character more and more as the story goes on

the second game of the deponia series and it keeps up with the humor   as i said for the first game if you like pointandclick adventures have a good sense of humor and liked the first game this one is also for you   since the story continues after the first game you should play that one first though
